attributes.additional_details:
Countering the lies :Smart meters are not free -  estimated 11 Billion pounds , although the consumer pays for it . Greed will prevail long after the roll-out as they make meter readers redundant , pocket the savings and plunge millions more into fuel poverty .
The energy firms can introduce "surge pricing" in order to charge more at peak times,

Smart meters act like a spy in your home , all the data is stored on servers could be hacked.  

 Estimated bills will continue in  poor signal reception areas preventing transmission of data.

 Please sign the petition – thank-you 
smartmetersscam.co.uk
attributes.background:
11 Billion pound irrelevance by  government to brainwash us into having a smart meter . 100 million pounds has been allocated to advertise this   scandalous waste of money .The technology will be obsolete within 5 years. The first ones already installed are now obsolete.
www.smartmetersscam.co.uk/
